title: Pax Prime Events
body:
So I've been checking Pax Prime ticket availability for 2 MONTHS, EVERY MORNING, only to find out via Rito that there will no longer be any live League events at major conventions.. Yet as I sit here and watch the games between TSM and C9 from earlier today, I see the sad amount of fans in the stands and I can't help but remember the INSANE amount of fans that filled the expo hall at the Washington State Convention Center last summer. I realize they want to branch out, but they also screwed over Pacific Northwest fans by revoking OUR opportunity to watch the NA teams represent.  

Does anyone else feel my pain?

replies.body:
While I do miss these events, riot has evolved to not needing a separate convention to host them. They still have IEMs. Which is nice.

But now we get LCS splits, Wild Card Invitationals, Mid Season Invitationals, Worlds and All Stars.
